subject: info
description_text:
Salve oggi dovevo ricevere il pacco ma purtroppo non mi trovavo a casa per
una emergenza vorrei sapere se martedi ripassano ho devo annullare
l'ordine? caso mai passano io sono reperibile dopo le ore 13 prima sono al
lavoro in ogni caso vi lascio il mio numero di telefono 3495865118 cosi se
mi chiamano diro loro dove lasciarlo, vorrei avere notizie entro oggi al
massimo domani.

Numero della tracciabilità del pacco e *934C00071694F*
Numero Ordine # ‫407-9518134-4488348
fatemi sapere grazie.

conversations.body_text:
rispondetemi qua che non so usare ticket

service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Salvo De Stradis
>
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a
> ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you
> a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
>
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
> https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/7576?follow=email
>
> Thank you for your patience.
> View ticket
> <https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/7576?follow=email>
> *If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address
> bar: *https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/7576?follow=email
>
> Regards,
> simsonn Support Team
>
> 7576:4206036
>

Ya recibí el pedido gracias ?



Il giorno gio 11 dic 2025 alle 09:03 General and sales enquiries <
service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hola Salvo, ¿podrías llamar a la empresa de transporte local al 803 160
> para coordinar la hora?
>
> ------------------------------
> service@simsonn.com
>
>
> *

Hi Salvo De Stradis,  Okay, I was just about to provide you with the local logistics contact. Once you receive the shipment, that’s fine. If you encounter any issues, feel free to contact us via email.
